meanings: (사람을) meet, see; (처음으로) (formal) encounter; (우연히) come across, run[bump] into
초대와 방문 It was nice seeing you.
초대와 방문 It was good to see you.

vlive.korean: 안녕하세요 저는 아스트로의 MJ입니다 만나서 반갑습니다! Hello, I am MJ of ASTRO. Nice to meet you! 듣기 View video ASTRO : 엠췌이 먹방이래요✌️
vlive.english: Hello, I am MJ of ASTRO. Nice to meet you!

vlive.korean: 안 그래도 네 명이서 만나서 밥 먹자는 - 얘기했나요? Having the four of us meet and eating... - You talked about it? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 용콩별콩 뒤집어지는 LIVE
vlive.english: Having the four of us meet and eating... - You talked about it?

vlive.korean: 만나서 뭐 했냐고요? What did we do when we met? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 달밤의 달디🌙🌙
vlive.english: What did we do when we met?

vlive.korean: 만나서 얘기도 하고 하면 좋겠죠? it would be nice to meet them and talk to them, right? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 오랜만🐢
vlive.english: it would be nice to meet them and talk to them, right?

vlive.korean: 만나서 반가워요~ Nice to meet you~ 듣기 View video ASTRO : 보이스온리 할거야😃

examples.korean: How lovely to see you! 발음듣기 널 만나서 정말 기뻐! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: How lovely to see you! 발음

examples.korean: It was lekker to see you again. 발음듣기 널 다시 만나서 기뻤어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was lekker to see you again. 발음

examples.korean: We must get together for a drink sometime. 발음듣기 우리 언제 만나서 한 잔 해야죠. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We must get together for a drink sometime. 발음

examples.korean: We must get together soon for lunch. 발음듣기 우리 곧 한 번 만나서 점심 함께 해야지. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We must get together soon for lunch. 발음

examples.korean: We should meet for lunch more often. 발음듣기 우리 더 자주 만나서 점심 식사를 하도록 해요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We should meet for lunch more often. 발음
